nodes.text: Kron was a male who served as an ambassador from Alderaan. Around 32 BBY, during the time of the Battle of Naboo, he was acting as ambassador to Naboo from Alderaan. He was trapped on Naboo during the Trade Federation blockade and ensuing invasion of the planet. A dying Naboo palace guard gave a group of unidentified heroes a diplomatic pouch bearing the Queen's seal with the instructions that it was vital that it be given to Ambassador Kron.
